trans-unit.source: To perform the steps in this article, you'll need to [install the Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows (Azure CLI)](xplat-install.md) and you'll need to [log on to Azure](xplat-connect.md).
trans-unit.target: To perform the steps in this article, you'll need to [install the Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows (Azure CLI)](xplat-install.md) and you'll need to [log on to Azure](xplat-connect.md).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you don't have an Azure account, you'll need one.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you don't have an Azure account, you'll need one.

trans-unit.source: Go sign up for a [free trial here](sign-up-organization.md).
trans-unit.target: Go sign up for a [free trial here](sign-up-organization.md).

trans-unit.source: In addition, to follow along completely you'll need to have either [jq](https://stedolan.github.io/jq/) or some other JSON parsing tool or library installed.
trans-unit.target: In addition, to follow along completely you'll need to have either [jq](https://stedolan.github.io/jq/) or some other JSON parsing tool or library installed.
